remarks: Inference eliminating two antecedents from the four possible cases that result from their true/false combinations.  (Contributed by NM, 25-Oct-2003.)
statement:
4cases.1 $e |- ( ( ph /\ ps ) -> ch ) $.
4cases.2 $e |- ( ( ph /\ -. ps ) -> ch ) $.
4cases.3 $e |- ( ( -. ph /\ ps ) -> ch ) $.
4cases.4 $e |- ( ( -. ph /\ -. ps ) -> ch ) $.
4cases $p |- ch $.
